hero.title: saneatsu.me
hero.description: Articles about programming, development tools, and daily insights on technology and lifestyle.

description.title: About the Business Integration
description.content:
Since Mobile Order Lab, Inc. and tacoms, Inc. have merged, we are displaying logos from both companies.

For more details, please see the [business integration press release](https://prtimes.jp/main/html/rd/p/000000047.000077961.html).

description.title: Started working as a freelancer
description.content:
Working 4 hours per day. While I did write code, my primary role was to enhance the base capabilities of the frontend team and serve as an advisor to the development team.

I shared various ideas about what we could do to make things better, and while writing concrete code, I contributed to building a team culture where we continuously learn and improve to develop better.
description.other:
**Advisor**
- Facilitating retrospectives
- Setting product goals
- Reading and discussing the Scrum Guide
- Designing effective meetings
- Organizing roadmaps
- Introducing AI and sharing knowledge

**Product Owner / Scrum Master**
- Introduced GitHub Project to organize the backlog
- Designed effective Refinement sessions
- Conducted Scrum study sessions

**Lead Engineer**
- Designed the overall frontend architecture
- Built testing infrastructure from scratch (it was zero before), conducted study sessions, and integrated it into the development cycle
  - Vitest, Storybook, Playwright
- Introduced Feature-Slice Design
- Built a culture of refactoring by increasing tests and breaking down large components into appropriately sized ones
- Conducted study sessions on Cycle Time and Four Keys, visualized metrics, and held weekly retrospectives to improve the team's learning cycle
- Reduced lead time
- Conducted study sessions
  - Weekly study sessions continue to be held even after I left the team

description.title: 2023-09: Creation of a chat branching workflow editor
description.content:
Creation of an editor that makes it easy to create chat branching workflows and preview them in LINE's UI.

To fundamentally improve operations, I analyzed and identified the core bottlenecks, and created a demo product in one week by myself and released it internally.
I continued development in my spare time, and from November 2023, the product was recognized and the team started moving. I created a rich editor for creating workflows using Next.js and React Flow. With a team including a first-year engineer, we created a v0.1 product in about 8 months, reducing lead time by up to 75%.

description.title: 2020-09: Development of DMM Chat Boost CV
description.other:
In February 2020, we became a subsidiary of DMM, and at the same time, we moved the office to the current Yushima location.
We increased the number of employees to about 200, and development began in earnest using Scrum with advisors invited.

description.title: 2019-10: Development of a health app for a construction company
description.content: Development of a health app for a construction company.

description.title: 2019-06: Creation of a meeting audio transcription app
description.content: Creation of a meeting audio transcription app.
description.other: We rented a 1K office in Mita, and the three company members lived in the same nearby apartment building (floors 4, 5, and 7) and commuted to work.

description.title: 2018-12: Development of a character video generation system
description.content: Development of a system that generates videos of a character moving, using a single bust-up image of the character as input.

description.title: 2018-07: Development of a system to create room layouts from multiple photos
description.content: Development of a system to create room layouts from multiple photos.
description.other:
At this time, we didn't have an office yet, so we basically worked at the founder's house with two desks side by side.
Since all company members were initial members belonging to [KERNEL](https://deepcore.jp/kernel), we also started working at [KERNEL HONGO](https://ut-base.info/facilities/8) from time to time.
Also, within the company, we took turns reading and presenting machine learning-related papers every week.

description.title: 2018-02: AI-based Anomaly Detection System for Factory
description.content: Developed a system that detects anomalies in factory production lines using image analysis.

description.title: 2017-12: In-house Product Development
description.content: Developed in-house products at SONY from requirements definition to implementation.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: saneatsu.me (the 'Site') is a personal website that provides technical articles and blog content. The Site does not collect any personal information from users (including email addresses, names, or profile pictures).

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: The Site uses Google Analytics for access analysis. Google Analytics uses cookies to collect visitor behavior data in a non-personally identifiable manner. For information about the data collected and how it is used, please refer to Google's Privacy Policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For inquiries about this Privacy Policy, please contact nito.tech.official@gmail.com.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: This Privacy Policy may be changed as necessary.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using saneatsu.me (the 'Site'), you are deemed to have agreed to these Terms of Service.

service.title: Service Description
service.content: The Site is a personal website that provides technical articles and blog content. Some content may include AI-assisted translations or generated text, and the Site does not guarantee its accuracy. Service content may change without notice.

affiliate.title: Affiliate Links and Advertising
affiliate.content: This site is a participant in the Amazon Associates Program, an affiliate advertising program designed to provide a means for sites to earn advertising fees by advertising and linking to Amazon.co.jp. If you click on a link in an article and make a purchase, this site may earn a referral fee. The presence or absence of a referral fee does not affect the product price. We may add other affiliate programs or advertisements in the future. All articles on this site may contain affiliate links including Amazon Associates.

externalLinks.title: External Links
externalLinks.content: This site contains links to external websites. The Site assumes no responsibility for the content, services, or transactions on linked sites. Please refer to each site's privacy policy and terms of service when using external sites.

userObligations.title: User Obligations
userObligations.content: Users must comply with the following when browsing the Site and when submitting inquiries or other information:

items.lawful: Not engage in activities that violate laws or public order and morals
items.respectful: Not infringe on the rights or privacy of others
items.accurate: Provide accurate and up-to-date information when submitting inquiries or feedback
items.security: Not engage in unauthorized access or activities that place excessive load on the system

items.illegal: Activities related to illegal acts or criminal acts
items.harmful: Activities that damage the reputation or credibility of others

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property Rights
intellectualProperty.content: The copyright of the content on the Site (text, images, programs, etc.) belongs to the Site or legitimate rights holders. Unauthorized copying, reproduction, or modification is prohibited.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The Site does not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of the information provided. Except where liability is required by law, the Site is not responsible for any damages arising from its use.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: The Site is not responsible for damages caused by interruption, suspension, termination, change, or unavailability of the service, unless caused by the Site's willful misconduct or gross negligence.

termination.title: Termination of Use
termination.content: If a user violates these Terms, the Site may suspend the use of the service without prior notice.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.content: These Terms are governed by and construed in accordance with Japanese law.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: These Terms may be changed as necessary. Updated Terms take effect when posted on the Site. Material changes will be communicated through reasonable means on the Site.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions regarding these Terms or the operation of the Site, please contact nito.tech.official@gmail.com.
